        public void testSetDataMultiSel()
        Tests the setData() method in multi selection mode. In this mode it should be possible to set the indices of the selected rows at once.

        public void testSetDataNull()
        Tests setting the data to null. This should clear the selection.

        Tests setting the data to an invalid value. This should cause an exception.

      • testSetDataNumber

        public void testSetDataNumber()
        Tests calling the setData() method with a Number object. This should be automatically converted into an int.
